subject: Re[1]: i'm writing to find love
body:
Hi, Klaus

It is so strange, but very exciting feeling... I have never met you, but  my heart has longed  for you as soon as I have seen you. I want to take care of you with all my heart. If want to find your companion, look at me here http://thanxtolove.com/waiting
My inner voice says to me that you are  the companion that I have wanted for so long.  You are the man with whom I want to share life's adventures.

Have a nice day
Irisha G
